instructions: Open the note you want to share. Tap the Share button , then choose how to send your note.

Open the note you want to share. Note: You can t collaborate on a locked note. Tap the Add People button , tap Share Options, then choose Can make changes or View only. Choose how to send your invitation (for example, using Mail or Messages).

In the folder list, tap the folder you want to share. Note: You can t collaborate on a folder with locked notes. Tap the More button , tap Add People, tap Share Options, then choose Can make changes or View only. Choose how to send your invitation (for example, using Mail or Messages).
Open the note you want to print. Tap the Share button at the top of the note, then tap Print.
